meanings.definition: A style of blackletter typeface used in German-speaking countries.
meanings.sent1: The old book was written in fraktur, making it difficult to read for some people.
meanings.sent2: The fraktur font gives a traditional and historic look to the text.
meanings.sent3: The invitation was printed in fraktur, giving it a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent4: Her tattoo was designed in fraktur, symbolizing her love for German culture.
meanings.sent5: The fraktur script added a unique charm to the wedding invitations.

meanings.definition: A type of folk art originating in Pennsylvania Dutch communities.
meanings.sent1: The artist created beautiful fraktur paintings inspired by nature.
meanings.sent2: Fraktur designs often feature colorful birds and flowers.
meanings.sent3: The fraktur artwork at the fair captured everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: Her fraktur piece was a masterpiece of intricate patterns and symbols.
meanings.sent5: The fraktur style of painting has a rich history in the region.

meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed a fraktur in the patient's arm after the fall.
meanings.sent2: A fraktur requires proper medical attention to heal correctly.
meanings.sent3: The x-ray showed a clear fraktur in the broken bone.
meanings.sent4: The fraktur was set in a cast to allow for proper healing.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's fraktur meant they had to sit out the rest of the season.
